main event: A witness observed a flying object high in the sky, oblong in shape, moving at high speed and flashing various colored lights before making a sharp turn and leaving the area.
interesting points: The sighting involved an oblong object that stopped suddenly and flashed colored lights., The object was reported to have traveled at a high rate of speed., The witness's observations included details about changes in direction and speed., The sighting lasted for approximately two minutes., The report suggests the sighting was valid with no obvious explanation.
sighted object: a flying oblong object with colored lights
witness description: A Civilian and possibly others in the area including a housewife and a USAF reserve captain.
